name: Pop-up Clicker
description:
Click the pop-ups, earn score and buy power-ups!

After years, i finally made my first real game and uploaded (i didn't spend years on this game, i made it in less than 1 week)!

If you find any bugs, please comment the bug, so i can try to fix it.

WARNING: Saving doesn't work properly on web version.

--THE POWER-UPS--

Auto-Clicker (50 Points) : Earn 1 Point every second.

Hyper-Clicker (100 Points) : Earn 1 Point every 0.5 seconds.

Power-Clicker (250 Points) : Earn 1 Point every 0.25 seconds.

MORE POWER-UPS COMING SOON!

--CHANGELOG--

v 1.0 : Initial release.
